meanings.definition: immensest: superlative form of immense, meaning extremely large or great.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was the immensest animal in the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The mountain was the immensest I had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The immensest cake at the party was so big, it could feed the whole town!
meanings.sent4: Her immensest collection of books filled the entire room.
meanings.sent5: The immensest wave crashed against the shore, towering over everything in its path.
